alert.note: Alert for Converse; Goshen; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 4:26PM MDT until July 19 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GOSHEN...NORTHEASTERN PLATTE AND SOUTHEASTERN CONVERSE COUNTIES... At 426 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Two Moon Campground, or 27 miles north of Wheatland, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Glendo, Sibley Peak, Glendo Reservoir and Two Moon Campground. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 97 and 118. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
